ProcessTemplates.Name: Copy a single file from a local fileshare to SFTP server
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process will read a file from the fileshare, and move it without any processing to an SFTP location.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/frends-shared-data/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to local directory from where the file will be moved"},"InFileName":{"Value":"\"example.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of file to be moved"},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path on target SFTP server where file will be moved to"},"TargetFileName":{"Value":"\"example.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name to be given to file on moving"},"TargetServerAddress":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.blob.core.windows.net\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Target SFTP address"},"TargetServerUser":{"Value":"\"frendstemplates.sftp.frendstemplates\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"User for target SFTP server."},"TargetServerPassword":{"Value":"\"OinLoo6QEssEYzvqokPv6eJD8KUh2K4X\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Password for the user for target SFTP server."}}

Process.Name: Copy a single file from a local fileshare to SFTP server
Process.Description: This Process will read a file from the fileshare, and move it without any processing to an SFTP location.
